General.Name: Smartiks Yazilim AS
General.Description: Smartiks Yazilim A.S. offers business solution, software development, and consulting services in Turkey. The company's solutions include data security, outsourcing, analysis consultancy, data science, data warehouse, customer relationship management, human resources, and corporate software development solutions. Smartiks Yazilim A.S. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Sahrayicedit Mh. Halk Sk. Kayalar, Istanbul, Turkey
